MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:07am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and repairs for damaged equipment on London Road. It has also been necessary to for our engineers to remove power to additional properties in the area for safety. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:30am on 17th January
